metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13262 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Client-Side code injection through Mermaid markup in GitLab CE/EE 12.9 andlater through 13.0.1 allows a specially crafted Mermaid payload to PUTrequests on behalf of other users via clicking on a link

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
